div.l: Right att þe entre of þe doore be hynde
Þou schalt a Cake of half a busshel fynde
That was made of youre own mele
Which þat I halp̄e my fader for to stele
And good lemman god þe saue ⁊and kepe
And wᵗith þat word almost sche gan to wepe
Aleyn vp rose / and thowth or þᵗat it dawe
I woll go crepe in be my Felowe
And fonde þe Cradill att his hond anon̄
By god qduod he alwrong haue y goon̄
Myn heed is toty of my swynk to nyght
That makith me þat y go not a right
I woot well by þe Cradell y haue mys goo
Here lieth þe Miller and his wife also
And forth he goth on xxᵗⁱ devilway
Vnto þe bedde þer as þe Miller lay
He wende to haue crope in bi his felowe Iohn
And by þe Miller in he crepith anon̄
And cauth hym bi þe necke ⁊and softe spake
And seide þou Iohn þou swynes heed awake
For Cristes soule / and here a noble game
For bi þat lord þat clepid is Seynt Iame
I haue · iijᵉˢ · in this schort nyght
Swyfed þe Millers doughter bolt vp right
While þou hast as a Coward be a gast
Ye fals harlott qduod þe Miller hast
A Falce Traytour // fals Clerk qduod he
Þou schalt be deed bi goddes dignite
Who durst be so bolde to desperage
My doughter þat is come of soche lynage
And by the throte bol he cauth aleyn̄
And he hent hym dispitously agayn̄
And on þe noose he smote hym wᵗith his feste
Þat doun ran þe blody streme vpon his breste
And in þe floor wᵗith nose and mouth y broke
Þei walowe as doth two pigges in a poke
And vp þei goon̄ / and doun a yen anoon̄
Til þat þe Miller spurned att a stoon̄
And doun he fell bacward on his wife
Þat wiste no thyng of þis nyce stryfe
For sche was falle a slepe a litle wight
Wᵗith Iohn þe Clerk þat waked had all nyght
And wᵗith þe fall out of here slepe sche brayde
Helpe holy Cros of Bromholm̄ sche sayde
In manus tuas lorde to the y call
Awake Symkyn þe fend is on me fall
Myn hert is broken̄ help y am but deed
Þer lieth oon vpon my wombe ⁊and on my heed
Helpe Symkyn for þe fals Clerkys fight
Þis Iohn stert vp as faste as euer he myght
And gropith by þe walles to and froo
To fynde a staffe and sche stert vp also
And knewe þe Corners better þan dede þⁱˢ Iohn
And by þe wall sche fonde a staffe anon̄
And sawe a litle glemeryng of a light
